Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    The Maze class will hold the contents of the maze and provide traversal methods to move through the maze The algorithm use here requires that the ending point is on the right side and the entry is on the left
    Author:
    Ben Weinberg

        public static char getUp(Point current,
                         Point[][] pointArray)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the data at the point above

      • charArrToPointArr

        public static Point[][] charArrToPointArr(char[][] mazeIn)
        Changes a character array into an array of points (custom cass made by me)

        Returns:
        the point array

      • mazeTraversal

        public static boolean mazeTraversal(char[][] mazeIn,
                                    int currentRow,
                                    int currentColumn)
        A recursive algorithm to solve mazes
        Parameters:
        mazeIn - the input character array of a maze
        currentRow - the starting row
        currentColumn - the starting column
        Returns:
        true if the maze was solved, false if the maze was not solved
